issue.title: [Website] Site navbar cannot be expanded
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4775](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4775). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found that the navbar at the top of the page cannot be expanded when the page is narrow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4775?focusedCommentId=16784784) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3814
